name: Satellite Dreamer
description:
Satellite Dreamer

Explore an abandoned satellite and navigate quickly through dangerous chambers using explosives to enhance your movement. Find out what lurks deep below.

Controls

I would recommend playing full screen!

WASD/ARROWS to move

SPACE to jump

LEFT CLICK to fire your weapon

Q/E to switch weapons

RIGHT CLICK Blow up grenade launcher grenade 

F Full screen

M Mute the music

When you get the cannon, you can shoot the ground under you to rocket jump. You must use this to get through the game! Good luck!

Credits

All art, game play and music was done by me(sam)

Fonts are by somepx

Sound effects are from shapeforms
